nodes.documentation:
InterchainAccount contract represents the interchain account that is made by InterchainAccountRouter contract.
InterchainAccountRouter contract will made the InterchainAccount contract if RegisterIBCAccountPacket is delivered by IBC.
And returns the address of new InterchainAccount contract's address.
If InterchainAccountRouter contract get RegisterIBCAccountPacket via IBC, it will execute `runTx` in InterchainAccount.
`runTx` will execute `Call` to recipient with requested value and data.
nodes.name: InterchainAccount

nodes.documentation: This method can be executed by only owner that is InterchainAccountRouter.
nodes.name: runTx

InterchainAccountRouter contract will made the InterchainAccount contract if RegisterIBCAccountPacket is delivered by IBC.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

runTx(address,uint256,bytes).notice: This method can be executed by only owner that is InterchainAccountRouter.

userdoc.notice: InterchainAccount contract represents the interchain account that is made by InterchainAccountRouter contract. InterchainAccountRouter contract will made the InterchainAccount contract if RegisterIBCAccountPacket is delivered by IBC. And returns the address of new InterchainAccount contract's address. If InterchainAccountRouter contract get RegisterIBCAccountPacket via IBC, it will execute `runTx` in InterchainAccount. `runTx` will execute `Call` to recipient with requested value and data.
